Pre-Game Insights: The match is the first T20I of the series following a 3-0 whitewash in the previous formats.
David Warner is returning to international cricket after quitting Test and ODI formats.
The Bellerive Oval pitch is historically batting-friendly with afternoon sea winds.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Historical head-to-head statistics show 19 matches with 9 wins for Australia and 10 for West Indies.
The series will be played at three venues: Hobart, Adelaide, and Perth.
